sentences.en: A monkey was playing in a tall tree rive.
sentences.cn: 一只猴子正在河边的一棵高高的树上玩耍.

sentences.en: A rive is to a fish what a house is to a man.
sentences.cn: 河对于鱼来说就象房子对于人.

sentences.en: Double charge will rive a connon.
My huckleberry friend, Moon rive And me.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友, 月河,跟我.

sentences.en: Rive that lies on the north of the city is a key waterway artery.
sentences.cn: 横卧北侧的长江是通往外地的重要水运干道.

sentences.en: The ice in the rive melts away and some fishes swimming in it.
sentences.cn: 小河里的冰都融化了,很多鱼儿在那里面游来游去.

sentences.en: The scenery of Qingjiang Rive attracts the people by its pretty and calmness.
sentences.cn: 清江风光以秀美恬静让人留连忘返.

sentences.en: The third bridge over the Yangtze Rive has also started construction.
You can hike in the mountains , In a forest or along a rive.
sentences.cn: 你可以到山里 、 森林里或沿河边旅行.

trans.tran_cn: 撕开, 劈开, 使沮丧
猛地劈开[撕开]，劈开（木头或石头）
